descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://sphotos-a.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/886639_10200855267323492_798668600_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=red][size=20]News[/size][/color]
[size=14]Where is the mod stage at?[/size]
I stop working on it again, since the creation kit was giving me alot of problems had to reinstall it 100 times and still got errors, the mod is on standby for now.
[size=14]30/10/2013[/size]
I Decided to start working on this mod again but not like i used to, so it will take some time until the final version is complete or at least the first big part of beta. Stay tuned!
[size=14]8/4/2013[/size]
I finaly manage to fix the first part of the quest on the Beta file wich i have not upload yet, since i had to re-script some quests it would take sometime.

This project is on stand by for now, since there is alot of scripts missing i would have to redo alot, sorry about this, If you have experience doing quest/level/scripting or other things and you wanna join this project let me know via pm.

[color=green][size=20]Info.[/size][/color]
Well this is a work in progress not alot of info will be provide at this Alpha Stage. Im just a new mod creator Learning tips and Tricks about the Creation Kit and some modeling in the future.
So far theres 3 npcs with voice acting (just a few dialogs for testing purpose) i will improve this in the future. Also theres only arround 2-3 quest this is more like a test - Again its a WIP.

[color=purple][size=20]Starting Quest[/size][/color]

The quest start at the bee and barb in riften, go to the second floor and you will find the npc called Fragrol.

[color=yellow][size=20]Quest/Lore.[/size][/color]

At this point its all about creating a new Faction/brotherhood called Dark Arrows they will be base on hunters/archers/fighters this will change eventualy depending on the next updates or ideas.

[color=red][size=20]IMPORTANT!![/size][/color]

I recommend to test this mod on a separate save file, backup everything before testing it just in case. Also you must have at least Dawnguard to play this mod without errors. Some Screenshots are out of date, i will update them when more progress is made.

Also Olifan's location is being show on the screenshots, i will fix this on the next release.

[color=lightblue][size=20]Video Preview[/size][/color]

[youtube]wBOUz2xzPxU[/youtube]

[color=white][size=20]Bugs/Suggestions[/size][/color]

If you found any bug/glitch feel free to leave a comment, also if you wanna help with ideas or if you are experience in modeling/scripting or anything else i would be glad to work with you.

[color=orange][size=20]Other/credits[/size][/color]

This will be a Nexus Exclusive for now!!
DO NOT UPLOAD TO OTHER WEBSITE

Credits to Bethesda for the Creation kit and Skyrim.

Also sorry for my english i know is not the best but oh well haha.
author: Darkdream

files.name: Dark Arrows  v0-1a
files.changelogHtml: Added file to nexus - info page
